overview: When a maid is shot dead in the exclusive resort community of the Hamptons, private investigator Linus (Roy Scheider in his final film role) must play a dangerous game of cat and mouse with the chief suspect, Davis Meyers (Bill Sage), a trophy husband with something to hide in this Hitchcockian tale of infidelity, lust and murder.
tagline: A neat and nasty little gem!
title: Blue Blood
